interface.name: postfix_stub
interface.summary: Postfix stub interface. No access allowed.

template.name: postfix_domain_template
template.summary: Creates types and rules for a basic postfix process domain.

template.name: postfix_server_domain_template
template.summary: Creates a postfix server process domain.

template.name: postfix_user_domain_template
template.summary: Creates a process domain for programs that are ran by users.

template.name: postfix_per_role_template
template.summary: The per role template for the postfix module.

param.name: prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain. (e.g., user is the prefix of user_t)

interface.name: postfix_config_filetrans
interface.summary: Create files with the specified type in the postfix configuration directories.

param.name: private type
param.summary: The type of the object to be created.

param.name: object
param.summary: The object class of the object being created.

interface.name: postfix_dontaudit_rw_local_tcp_sockets
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to read and write postfix local delivery TCP sockets.

interface.name: postfix_dontaudit_use_fds
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to use postfix master process file file descriptors.

interface.name: postfix_domtrans_map
interface.summary: Execute postfix_map in the postfix_map domain.

interface.name: postfix_run_map
interface.summary: Execute postfix_map in the postfix_map domain, and allow the specified role the postfix_map domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the postfix_map domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the postfix_map domain to use.

interface.name: postfix_domtrans_master
interface.summary: Execute the master postfix program in the postfix_master domain.

interface.name: postfix_exec_master
interface.summary: Execute the master postfix program in the caller domain.

interface.name: postfix_domtrans_smtp
interface.summary: Execute the master postfix program in the postfix_master domain.

interface.name: postfix_domtrans_user_mail_handler
interface.summary: Execute postfix user mail programs in their respective domains.
